name: Kashmir Valley Retreat
description: Experience the breathtaking beauty of the Kashmir Valley, with serene lakes and snow-capped mountains.
Day1: Arrival and shikara ride on Dal Lake; stay in a houseboat.
Day2: Visit Mughal Gardens; evening walk along the Jhelum River.
Day3: Excursion to Gulmarg; gondola ride and snow activities.
Day4: Day trip to Pahalgam; explore lush meadows and rivers.
Day5: Relaxation and shopping for local crafts; departure.

name: Kerala Backwater Retreat
description: Unwind in the serene backwaters of Kerala with luxurious houseboat experiences and tranquil surroundings.
Day1: Arrival and houseboat check-in; evening cruise and traditional Kerala dinner.
Day2: Backwater tour and village visit; seafood feast at a local restaurant.
Day3: Relaxing spa day and leisure time; departure.

name: Rajasthan Desert Camp
description: Experience the cultural richness and vastness of the Thar Desert with luxury camping.
Day1: Arrival and desert camp setup; star-gazing night.
Day2: Camel safari and dune bashing; evening folk dance.
Day3: Visit to local villages; cultural exchange with locals.
Day4: Sandboarding and relaxation; desert spa treatment.

name: Goa Beach Resort
description: Relax at a luxurious beachside resort in Goa, known for its vibrant culture and stunning coastline.
Day1: Arrival and welcome drinks; beach relaxation and sunset dinner.
Day2: Water sports and island exploration; evening Goan carnival.

name: Himalayan Mountain Retreat
description: Enjoy the serene beauty of the Himalayas from a cozy mountain retreat in Himachal Pradesh.
Day1: Arrival and cabin check-in; evening by the fireplace.
Day2: Trekking and snow activities; evening local folk music.
Day3: Scenic drive and local market visit; Himachali cuisine dinner.

name: Gujarat Heritage Tour
description: Explore the rich heritage and vibrant culture of Gujarat, from historic temples to modern cities.
Day1: Arrival and visit to Sabarmati Ashram; evening at Kankaria Lake.
Day2: Explore Rani Ki Vav and Sun Temple; overnight at Patan.
Day3: Visit Gir National Park and Somnath Temple.
Day4: Explore the historic city of Dwarka.
